description: Have leftover BBQ steak? Beef rice paper rolls, coming right up! Better yet, they're so easy to make - no cooking required. Try it today.
name: Beef Rice Paper Rolls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a large bowl with lukewarm water. Soak one sheet of rice paper in water for 10 seconds, remove and layer with portions of steak, avocado, cucumber, carrot and bean sprouts. Roll, tucking in sides, to form a spring roll. Repeat with remaining rice paper and ingredients. Garnish spring rolls with mint leaves and serve with hoisin sauce topped with crushed peanuts.
